languages.text: "Нам предстоит сражение, в котором нельзя сомневаться! Действуйте, Крударах нуждается в вашей защите!"

traits.locale_text: "Нам предстоит сражение, в котором нельзя сомневаться! Действуйте, Крударах нуждается в вашей защите!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"
languages.original_text: "Нам предстоит сражение, в котором нельзя сомневаться! Действуйте, Крударах нуждается в вашей защите!"

traits.locale_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

traits.locale_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: «¡No podemos permitirnos flaquear en esta batalla! ¡Ha llegado el momento de actuar! ¡Crudarach necesita vuestra protección!».
languages.original_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"

traits.locale_text: «¡No podemos permitirnos flaquear en esta batalla! ¡Ha llegado el momento de actuar! ¡Crudarach necesita vuestra protección!».
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: 「これより我々は躊躇できぬ戦いへ身を投じる！今こそ行動する時だ！クルダラは君たちの保護を必要としている！」
languages.original_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"

traits.locale_text: 「これより我々は躊躇できぬ戦いへ身を投じる！今こそ行動する時だ！クルダラは君たちの保護を必要としている！」
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: “战争马上要打响了！我们绝对不能动摇！做好准备！克鲁达拉赫需要你们保护！”
languages.original_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"

traits.locale_text: “战争马上要打响了！我们绝对不能动摇！做好准备！克鲁达拉赫需要你们保护！”
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: « Nous nous apprêtons à livrer un combat au cours duquel aucune hésitation ne nous sera permise ! Il est temps d'agir ! Crudarach a besoin de votre protection ! »
languages.original_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"

traits.locale_text: « Nous nous apprêtons à livrer un combat au cours duquel aucune hésitation ne nous sera permise ! Il est temps d'agir ! Crudarach a besoin de votre protection ! »
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Wir ziehen in eine Schlacht und dürfen nicht zögern! Es wird Zeit zu handeln! Crudarach braucht unseren Schutz!"
languages.original_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"

traits.locale_text: "Wir ziehen in eine Schlacht und dürfen nicht zögern! Es wird Zeit zu handeln! Crudarach braucht unseren Schutz!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01

languages.text: "Tereddüt etme lüksümüzün olmadığı bir savaşa gidiyoruz! Harekete geçme vakti! Crudarach'ın onu korumana ihtiyacı var!"
languages.original_text: "We are heading into a battle in which we cannot afford to hesitate! It is time to act! Crudarach needs your protection!"

traits.locale_text: "Tereddüt etme lüksümüz olmayan bir savaşa gidiyoruz! Harekete geçme vakti! Crudarach'ın korumana ihtiyacı var!"
traits.speaker: YrlietQ1_Farseer01
